channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - regression

item.title: New SELinux userspace release
item.description: A new release of the SELinux userspace utilities was recently announced. I have made the packages for Gentoo available and they should now be in the main tree (\~arch of course). During the testing of the packages however, I made a stupid mistake of running the tests on the wrong â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
